briefTitle: Study Immunology and Safety of 60-day Treatment of SQ Grass SLIT (Sublingual Immunotherapy)-Tablet in Adult Subjects With Grass Pollen-induced Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study Investigating the Immunologic Effects and Safety of 60-day Treatment of the SQ Grass SLIT-tablet in Adult Subjects With Grass Pollen-induced Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis

interventions.name: Phleum pratense grass pollen allergen extract

summary: To investigate the immunologic effects and safety of 60-day treatment of the Standardized Quality units (SQ) grass Sublingual immunotherapy (SLIT)-tablet in adult subjects with grass pollen-induced allergic rhinoconjunctivitis in a double-blind, placebo-controlled study.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Primary Efficacy Endpoint is Change From Baseline to End of Treatment of Phleum Pratense Specific Immunoglobulin G4 (IgG4) in Serum
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: baseline versus end of treatment (approx. 60 days)
